vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.3.15;
son of: Gera (H1617);
father of: Naaman (H5283J), Ahijah (H0281K), Gera (H1617J), Uzza (H5798H) and Ahihud (H0284)
Also named: e.chud (אֵחוּד "Ehud" H0261)
§ Ehud = "I will give thanks: I will be praised" or "undivided, union" in (1Ch. 8:6) only
1) Benjamite judge of Israel, deliverer of Israel from Moab
2) another Benjamite, son of Bilhan (1Ch 8:6)
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   juez de Israel ; (b)   hijo de Bilhán; tribu de Benjamín
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以笏 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "我將獻上感恩: 我將被讚美" 或 "不可分割的, 合一的"
1) 以色列的士師, 便雅憫人, 從摩押地來的以色列的解救者
2) 另一個便雅憫人, 比勒罕的兒子 (代上 7:10)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
以笏 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "我将献上感恩: 我将被赞美" 或 "不可分割的, 合一的"
1) 以色列的士师, 便雅悯人, 从摩押地来的以色列的解救者
2) 另一个便雅悯人, 比勒罕的儿子 (代上 7:10)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.10;
son of: Bilhan (H1092H);
brother of: Jeush (H3266H), Benjamin (H1144H), Chenaanah (H3668H), Zethan (H2133), Tarshish (H8659I) and Ahishahar (H0300)
§ Ehud = "I will give thanks: I will be praised" or "undivided, union" in (1Ch. 8:6) only
1) Benjamite judge of Israel, deliverer of Israel from Moab
2) another Benjamite, son of Bilhan (1Ch 8:6)
